stories.text:
What is your company's on-call compensation scheme like? Are there any unique benefits or perks that you think work well in combination with financial benefits? How much do you get per period of on-call? Do these rise in line with inflation or cost of living increases?

There was a post that delved into this a while ago, but times have changed dramatically with more people now working remotely and inflation currently massively up.
stories.title: Ask HN: What is On-Call compensation like at your company?
We Moved from Helm to Gitpod Installer

stories.text:
We are based in the EU and are looking for a bank that will open an account for us.

SVB is not a good fit because of the fees and the experiences people have with them.

Brex declined us (Probably because we're bootstrapped and don't have enough money in the account).

Anyone has good experiences with another bank?
stories.title: Ask HN: What bank is available for Atlas companies that is not SVB?
